caltureValues.title: Cooperative
caltureValues.value: One for all ,all for one! We have a cooperative and open mindset. If one of us grows, all will follow.

caltureValues.title: Detail
caltureValues.value: We are a 'Centre of Excellence' as per global standards. We only compete with ourselves, but find in the global standard our only worthy rival.

caltureValues.title: Ownership
caltureValues.value: We are dependable and honour our commitments. When things don't go as planned, as they sometimes do, we communicate early to avoid catastrophe.

caltureValues.title: Empathy
caltureValues.value: We are nothing without people, and people have different contexts and needs. Our organization acts as a safe haven and shield for those in need.

caltureValues.title: Transparency
caltureValues.value: Transparency, an open mind, and an open heart hold our organization together. We commit to and promote full transparency to ourselves, our stakeholders, and our beneficiaries. We furthermore invest heavily in open-source and open-data projects, as true potential lies everywhere. Not just within.
